title: 小学英语接力版三年级起点五年级下册

chapters.title: Lesson 1 My favourite season is spring.
Lesson 3 There is a desk beside the bed.
Lesson 4 Don’t play football on the street.
Lesson 5 Is there a library in your school?
Lesson 6 Is there a bookshop near here?
Lesson 7 Your parents were young then.
Lesson 8 What did you do last Saturday?
Lesson 9 I went to Beijing on my last holiday.
Lesson 10 I’m going to play basketball.
